General.Name: Antec Inc
General.Description: Antec Inc. manufactures and sells computer components and accessories for the gaming, PC upgrade, and do-it-yourself markets in Taiwan and internationally. It offers cases, power supply, gaming chair, memory, and other accessories, as well as cooling products, such as case fans, and CPU liquid and air coolers. The company was formerly known as Ming Jong Technologies Co., Ltd. Antec Inc. was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: 47681 Lakeview Boulevard, Fremont, CA, United States, 94538
